name: PromoMii
slogan: AI driven video editing Saas platform creating trailers from movies and series in minutes
description: PromoMii is an AI-driven video editing and analytics SaaS platform. Our algorithm creates promos and trailers from original movies/series/videos in minutes. We help alleviate creatives and marketeers from manual, labor-intensive tasks of video editing and idea validation by streamlining post-production, allowing creatives to produce multiple videos in minutes. This means, that users of our platform have more time to focus on a solid and creative end-product as they don't waste hours on boring and time-consuming tasks. We are bridging the gap between the increasing video-content consumption demands and production capacity with a further solution for mass content personalisation in an easy-to-use, cost and time-efficient manner. Our whole team consists of veterans from the TV Industry and combined we have more than 60 years experience.

team.title: CEO and Founder
team.name: Michael M. Moss
team.bioHtml: I'm a passionate tech entrepreneur who has kick-started several start-ups and has extensive expertise in product development and UX optimization.

team.title: Creative Director
team.name: Lilian Schiffler
team.bioHtml: Worked at MTG, Nordic Entertainment Group UK Ltd

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Are you a driven, movie/video enthusiastic individual who wants to grow and develop a startup that's on its way to revolutionize the creative industry?

We are currently looking to recruit an innovative and quality-oriented Full Stack Developer (preferably based in London) to work with a dynamic, creative and leading-edge team. We are looking for someone who is exceedingly motivated with the ability to thrive and succeed under pressure and who wants to go far with the startup.


About PromoMii:

PromoMii is a Media tech startup based in London. We help broadcasters and creatives in trailer production with our AI-driven online video creation tool with the long-term goal of a full SaaS platform. Our current clients include BBC, SVT (Swedish National Broadcaster) and Viaplay (Scandinavians largest Streaming platform) with more trials taking place in 16 territories.

2020 Goals consist of delivering our technology to clients like BritBox and other big players.

It's an incredibly exciting time for PromoMii: We just participated in the accelerator program Startupbootcamp in Amsterdam and Alan Boyd, one of the original co-founders behind Microsoft, has joined us. For real go-getters, it’s an amazing opportunity as we're moving forward in high pace right now. For someone wishing to be at the forefront of our tech with real relevance to creatives everyday work, this is the place to be.

The rest of team consist of the Experienced CTO, Team-oriented Creative Director, Energetic and visionary CEO!


Experience:

This is a very competitive role, and we are looking for the best candidates to join us:

Proven experience with coding, software development, and implementation of cloud-based applications, eg. AWS, Azure, GCP
Proven experience in Node.js, JavaScript, ReactJS
Preferred experience in Python, Machine Learning
Experience with technology relative to the video industry (preferred)
Some leadership, team building and management skills
Some communication, documentation and presentation skills
Ability to lead the design and implementation of technology initiatives, including software, operating system software and productivity tools
Anticipate and react to technology and market trends to ensure the continued leadership in a competitive environment and adherence to compliance requirements

Furthermore:

you are fluent in English
you have a passion for technology and entrepreneurship
you are passionate about web technologies

What else do you get…?

- Knowledge!! This is not our first time around the block. We have started several companies before and will teach you the do’s and don’ts of creating a thriving business!
- Experience in market entry and analysis, fund raising, business strategy, IT development and everything in-and-around building a tech startup
- Flexible working hours
- Support in your personal career growth
- Fun people that love what they do
- A team that is longing for your ideas and opinions
- Salary + provision for closed sales
